Leaf Curl Disease.What is this disease?: Leaf Curl Disease affects plant leaves, causing them to curl and deform due to viral or fungal infections.
Leaf Curl Disease.What are the possible cures?: There is no cure for infected plants. Management includes removing infected parts and controlling insects.
Leaf Curl Disease.What causes this disease?: It is caused by viruses or fungi, often spread by insects like whiteflies.
Leaf Curl Disease.What are the common symptoms?: Symptoms include curling leaves, yellowing, and stunted growth.
Leaf Curl Disease.What is the traditional diagnosis?: Diagnosis is mainly through visual inspection for symptoms and lab testing.
Leaf Curl Disease.What are the preventive measures?: Preventive measures include using resistant plant varieties, controlling pests, and maintaining good hygiene.
